about_the_game:
Get ready to rev your engines and join the ultimate battle in an abandoned steel work factory. In this fast-paced multiplayer game, you'll take control of a powerful car armed with a variety of weapons, from machine guns to rocket launchers, and face off against other players from around the world.

As you navigate the industrial environment, you'll need to use every trick in the book to outmaneuver your opponents and avoid hazards like molten steel and collapsing platforms. With realistic physics and dynamic environments, every battle is a unique experience that requires both skill and strategy to win.

Choose from a range of cars, each with its own unique strengths and weaknesses, and customize them with a variety of upgrades and accessories. Whether you prefer speed and agility or brute force and firepower, there's a car that's perfect for your playstyle.

With fast matchmaking and a vibrant community of players, the action never stops in this thrilling car battle game. So what are you waiting for? Jump into the driver's seat and start your engines today!

In this fast-paced multiplayer game, you'll take control of a powerful car armed with a variety of weapons, from machine guns to rocket launchers, and face off against other players from around the world.

As you navigate the industrial environment, you'll need to use every trick in the book to outmaneuver your opponents and avoid hazards like molten steel and collapsing platforms. With realistic physics and dynamic environments, every battle is a unique experience that requires both skill and strategy to win.

Choose from a range of cars, each with its own unique strengths and weaknesses, and customize them with a variety of upgrades and accessories. Whether you prefer speed and agility or brute force and firepower, there's a car that's perfect for your playstyle.

With fast matchmaking and a vibrant community of players, the action never stops in this thrilling car battle game. So what are you waiting for? Jump into the driver's seat and start your engines today!

name: SteelRacer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Join the ultimate battle in an abandoned steel work factory. In this fast-paced multiplayer game, you'll take control of a powerful car armed with a variety of weapons, from machine guns to rocket launchers, and face off against other players from around the world.
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Japanese, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Swedish
